product_name: Selle Italia Diva Gel Flow Saddle - Women's
long_description: Selle Italia Diva Gel Flow women's saddle offers a women-specific design to maximize comfort and support for all-day rides, be they on- or off-road. Saddle features a long-lasting, abrasion-resistant leather cover and soft, comfortable silicone gel inserts that have differentiated thicknesses around cutout. Large center cutout is shaped specifically for women and shifts a rider's weight to optimize comfort and relieve pelvic pressure. 10% carbon composite strengthens the lightweight shell without compromising flexibility. Shock-absorbent elastomer inserts between rails and shell help dampen road shocks and vibration. Vanadium-titanium "Vanox" alloy rails are lighter than titanium and offer strong, sturdy performance. The Selle Italia Diva Gel Flow women's saddle is handmade in Italy.
short_description: Selle Italia Diva Gel Flow women's saddle offers a women-specific design to maximize comfort and support for all-day rides, be they on- or off-road.
